title: Global pork exports 2020 , by country
yAxis: Export volume in thousand metric tons
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Export volume in thousand metric tons for 7 number of Countrys.
Country EU has the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons and China has the lowest Export volume in thousand metric tons.
There is a difference of 3800.0 between the maximum Country EU and minimum Country China.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Export volume in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
The maximum Export volume in thousand metric tons 3900.0 is found at Country EU and the minimum is found at China where Country is 100.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Export volume in thousand metric tons for 7 number of Countrys.
Country EU has the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons and China has the lowest Export volume in thousand metric tons.
There is a difference of 3800.0 between the maximum Country EU and minimum Country China.
max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
Country EU has the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons and China has the lowest Export volume in thousand metric tons.
The highest Country EU has 3800.0 more Export volume in thousand metric tons than the lowest Country China.
The Country EU has the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons, followed by United States, and Canada. Down to the Country China which is the lowest.
The highest value 3900.0 at EU is almost 2.64 times larger than the average value 1478.14.
The Export volume in thousand metric tons is 10347.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
